html:
2025-0821
2025-11-27PMOFinancial Administration ActOrder amending the composition of the Treasury BoardOrder (1) terminates the nominations made by Order in Council P.C. 2025-498 of May 13, 2025 and Order in Council P.C. 2025-506 of June 11, 2025 (2) nominates the following members of the King’s Privy Council for Canada who, in addition to the President of the Treasury Board and the Minister of Finance, are to constitute the Treasury Board (3) nominates the following members of the King’s Privy Council for Canada to be alternates to serve in the place of members of the Treasury Board (4) declares that three members of the Treasury Board constitute a quorum; and (5) directs the Minister of Finance to act as Vice-ChairN/A
subject: Order amending the composition of the Treasury Board
precis: Order (1) terminates the nominations made by Order in Council P.C. 2025-498 of May 13, 2025 and Order in Council P.C. 2025-506 of June 11, 2025 (2) nominates the following members of the King’s Privy Council for Canada who, in addition to the President of the Treasury Board and the Minister of Finance, are to constitute the Treasury Board (3) nominates the following members of the King’s Privy Council for Canada to be alternates to serve in the place of members of the Treasury Board (4) declares that three members of the Treasury Board constitute a quorum; and (5) directs the Minister of Finance to act as Vice-Chair
